channel.title: Need help!
channel.description: Hi guys, I have a bit of a problem on my server. Everytime someone dies the person gets kicked out of the server. Like when you die the server freezes and it says connection error.. then u logg out and need to log back in. This is very anoying and my players are thretning to leave the server. Please someone help me!!!!![br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 06:38:43 PM[/size][hr],

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @exile1 exile™
item.description:
@exile1 wrote:

the main reason you disconnect is because if people didn’t disconnect then people would appear walking through walls. So i think its good that you disconnect so dont worrie about it

Read full topic
